languages.text: {n}Ахиллеас издает рычащий звук, видимо, заменивший ему смешок, но затем надолго умолкает. Наконец он тихо рокочет:{/n} "В Империуме меня не ждет ничего хорошего. Изменник, чудовище, скверна — я отправлюсь на костер. Но может это и правильно".

{n}Achilleas lets out a growl that must count for laughter now, then falls silent for a while. At last, he says in a quiet rumble,{/n} "A return to the Imperium does not bode well for me. Traitor, monster, spawn of corruption — a bonfire is all I will find there. But perhaps it is the right way."
languages.original_text: {n}Ахиллеас издает рычащий звук, видимо, заменивший ему смешок, но затем надолго умолкает. Наконец он тихо рокочет:{/n} "В Империуме меня не ждет ничего хорошего. Изменник, чудовище, скверна — я отправлюсь на костер. Но может это и правильно".

traits.locale_text: {n}Achilleas lets out a growl that must have replaced chuckling for him, but then falls silent for a while. At last, he says in a quiet rumble,{/n} "A return to the Imperium does not bode well for me. Traitor, monster, spawn of corruption — a bonfire is all I will find there. But perhaps it is the right way."
traits.speaker: WrackServant

At last, he says in a quiet rumble,{/n} "A return to the Imperium does not bode well for me. Traitor, monster, spawn of corruption — a bonfire is all I will find there. But perhaps it is the right way."
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: {n}Achilleas laisse échapper un grognement pareil à une sorte de rire contrefait, puis reste silencieux durant quelques instants. Il finit par déclarer d'un ton guttural : {/n}« Un retour dans l'Imperium ne m'apporterait rien de bon. Je suis un traître, un monstre, un suppôt de la corruption... Je finirai au bûcher. Mais peut-être que c'est pour le mieux. »
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas lets out a growl that must count for laughter now, then falls silent for a while. At last, he says in a quiet rumble,{/n} "A return to the Imperium does not bode well for me. Traitor, monster, spawn of corruption — a bonfire is all I will find there. But perhaps it is the right way."

traits.locale_text: {n}Achilleas laisse échapper un grognement qui semble avoir remplacé son rire humain, puis reste silencieux durant quelques instants. Il finit par déclarer d'un ton guttural : {/n}« Un retour dans l'Imperium ne m'apporterait rien de bon. Je suis un traître, un monstre, un suppôt de la corruption... Je finirais au bûcher. Mais peut-être que c'est pour le mieux. »
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: {n}阿吉里亚斯发出一声低吼，听起来像是在放声大笑。随后，他沉默片刻，到最后才低声开了口。{/n}“回到帝国恐怕不会有什么好事。我是个叛徒、怪物、腐化的孽种——回去之后，恐怕只有火刑架会等着我。不过，或许这才是正确的道路。”
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas lets out a growl that must count for laughter now, then falls silent for a while. At last, he says in a quiet rumble,{/n} "A return to the Imperium does not bode well for me. Traitor, monster, spawn of corruption — a bonfire is all I will find there. But perhaps it is the right way."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿吉里亚斯发出一声低吼，听起来似乎本该是笑声才对。随后，他沉默片刻，到最后才低声开了口。{/n}“回到帝国恐怕不会有什么好事。我是个叛徒、怪物、腐化的孽种——回去之后，恐怕只有火刑架会等着我。不过，或许这才是正确的道路。”
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: {n}アキレアスは笑い声というよりは唸り声を上げ、しばらく沈黙した。そして最後に静かな声で言った。{/n}「帝国に戻っても、私ににいいことはありません。裏切り者、怪物、腐敗の産物…私を待ち受けるのはかがり火だけでしょう。ですが、それが当然の報いなのかもしれません」
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas lets out a growl that must count for laughter now, then falls silent for a while. At last, he says in a quiet rumble,{/n} "A return to the Imperium does not bode well for me. Traitor, monster, spawn of corruption — a bonfire is all I will find there. But perhaps it is the right way."

traits.locale_text: {n}アキレアスは笑い声というよりは唸り声を上げ、しばらく沈黙した。そして最後に静かな声で言った。{/n}「帝国に戻っても、私ににいいことはありません。裏切り者、怪物、腐敗の産物…私を待ち受けるのはかがり火だけでしょう。ですが、それが当然の報いなのかもしれません」
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: {n}Achilleas stößt ein Knurren aus, das wohl ein Lachen sein soll, verstummt dann aber. Schließlich sagt er leise grollend:{/n} "Eine Rückkehr zum Imperium verheißt für mich nichts Gutes. Verräter, Monster, Ausgeburt der Verderbnis – dort erwartet mich nur ein Scheiterhaufen. Aber vielleicht ist es der richtige Weg."
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas lets out a growl that must count for laughter now, then falls silent for a while. At last, he says in a quiet rumble,{/n} "A return to the Imperium does not bode well for me. Traitor, monster, spawn of corruption — a bonfire is all I will find there. But perhaps it is the right way."

traits.locale_text: {n}Achilleas stößt ein Knurren aus, das wohl eigentlich ein Kichern sein sollte, verstummt dann aber. Schließlich sagt er leise grollend:{/n} "Eine Rückkehr zum Imperium verheißt für mich nichts Gutes. Verräter, Monster, Ausgeburt der Verderbnis – dort erwartet mich nur ein Scheiterhaufen. Aber vielleicht ist es der richtige Weg."
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: {n}Achilleas suelta un gruñido que debe de ser su nueva forma de reír, pero luego calla durante un rato. Finalmente habla con voz ronca, pero suave:{/n} «Regresar al Imperium no me deparará nada bueno. Soy un traidor, un monstruo, un engendro de la corrupción... lo único que me espera allí es la hoguera. Pero tal vez sea para bien».
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas lets out a growl that must count for laughter now, then falls silent for a while. At last, he says in a quiet rumble,{/n} "A return to the Imperium does not bode well for me. Traitor, monster, spawn of corruption — a bonfire is all I will find there. But perhaps it is the right way."

traits.locale_text: {n}Achilleas suelta un gruñido que debe de ser su equivalente a una risa entre dientes, pero luego calla durante un rato. Finalmente habla con voz ronca, pero suave:{/n} «Regresar al Imperium no me deparará nada bueno. Soy un traidor, un monstruo, un engendro de la corrupción... lo único que me espera allí es la hoguera. Pero tal vez sea para bien».
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: {n}Achilleas, kahkahayı çağrıştıran bir hırıltı çıkarıp ardından bir süreliğine sessizleşiyor. Sonunda alçak ve boğuk bir sesle konuşuyor.{/n} "İmparatorluk'a dönmek hiç hayra alamet olmaz. Hain, canavar, yozlaşmanın tohumu olacağım... Orada beni bekleyen tek şey, şenlik ateşi olur. Ancak bu yolda layığımı bulabilirim."
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas lets out a growl that must count for laughter now, then falls silent for a while. At last, he says in a quiet rumble,{/n} "A return to the Imperium does not bode well for me. Traitor, monster, spawn of corruption — a bonfire is all I will find there. But perhaps it is the right way."

Sonunda alçak ve boğuk bir sesle konuşuyor.{/n} "İmparatorluk'a dönmek hiç hayra alamet olmaz. Hain, canavar, yozlaşmanın tohumu olacağım... Orada beni bekleyen tek şey, şenlik ateşi olur. Ancak bu yolda layığımı bulabilirim."
traits.speaker: WrackServant
